         <td><a href="/wiki/US_Open_(tennis)" title="US Open (tennis)">US Open</a></td> 
         <td>Hard</td> 
         <td><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Belarus" title="Belarus"><img alt="Belarus" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9a/Flag_of_Belarus_%281995%E2%80%932012%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Belarus_%281995%E2%80%932012%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9a/Flag_of_Belarus_%281995%E2%80%932012%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Belarus_%281995%E2%80%932012%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9a/Flag_of_Belarus_%281995%E2%80%932012%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Belarus_%281995%E2%80%932012%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="450"></a></span> Max Mirnyi</td> 
         <td><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/United_States" title="United States"><img alt="United States" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/35px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/46px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1235" data-file-height="650"></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Patrick_Galbraith" title="Patrick Galbraith">Patrick Galbraith</a><br><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/United_States" title="United States"><img alt="United States" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/35px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/46px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1235" data-file-height="650"></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Lisa_Raymond" title="Lisa Raymond">Lisa Raymond</a></td> 
         <td>6–2, 6–2 </td>
        </tr> 
        <tr style="background:#ffc;"> 
         <td style="background:#ffa07a;">Loss</td> 
         <td><a href="/wiki/1999_Australian_Open_%E2%80%93_Mixed_Doubles" title="1999 Australian Open – Mixed Doubles">1999</a></td> 
         <td>Australian Open</td> 
         <td>Hard</td> 
         <td><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Belarus" title="Belarus"><img alt="Belarus" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9a/Flag_of_Belarus_%281995%E2%80%932012%29.svg/23px-Flag_of_Belarus_%281995%E2%80%932012%29.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="12" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9a/Flag_of_Belarus_%281995%E2%80%932012%29.svg/35px-Flag_of_Belarus_%281995%E2%80%932012%29.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/9a/Flag_of_Belarus_%281995%E2%80%932012%29.svg/46px-Flag_of_Belarus_%281995%E2%80%932012%29.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="450"></a></span> Max Mirnyi</td> 
         <td><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/South_Africa" title="South Africa"><img alt="South Africa" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/23px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/35px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/45px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span> <a href="/wiki/David_Adams_(tennis)" title="David Adams (tennis)">David Adams</a><br><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/South_Africa" title="South Africa"><img alt="South Africa" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/23px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png" decoding="async" width="23" height="15" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/35px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/af/Flag_of_South_Africa.svg/45px-Flag_of_South_Africa.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Mariaan_de_Swardt" title="Mariaan de Swardt">Mariaan de Swardt</a></td> 
         <td>4–6, 6–4, 6–7<sup>(5–7)</sup> </td>
        </tr>
       </tbody>
      </table> 
      <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Records">Records</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Serena_Williams&amp;action=edit&amp;section=47" title="Edit section: Records">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2> 
      <div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">
       Main article: 
       <a href="/wiki/List_of_career_achievements_by_Serena_Williams" title="List of career achievements by Serena Williams">List of career achievements by Serena Williams</a>
      </div> 
      <ul>
       <li>Records in <b>bold</b> indicate peer-less achievements.</li> 
       <li>Records in <i>italics</i> are currently active streaks.<sup class="noprint Inline-Template" style="white-space:nowrap;">[<i><a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Manual_of_Style/Dates_and_numbers#Chronological_items" title="Wikipedia:Manual of Style/Dates and numbers"><span title="The time period mentioned near this tag is ambiguous. (July 2019)">when?</span></a></i>]</sup></li>
      </ul>

         <td>2003–2008</td> 
         <td>2 <a href="/wiki/Hopman_Cup" title="Hopman Cup">Hopman Cup</a> titles</td> 
         <td><a href="/wiki/Dominik_Hrbat%C3%BD" title="Dominik Hrbatý">Dominik Hrbatý</a><br><a href="/wiki/Tommy_Robredo" title="Tommy Robredo">Tommy Robredo</a><br><a href="/wiki/James_Blake_(tennis)" title="James Blake (tennis)">James Blake</a><br><a href="/wiki/Arantxa_S%C3%A1nchez_Vicario" title="Arantxa Sánchez Vicario">Arantxa Sánchez Vicario</a> </td>
        </tr> 
        <tr> 
         <td>2002–2015</td> 
         <td><a href="/wiki/Miami_Masters#Records" class="mw-redirect" title="Miami Masters">8 Miami Masters singles titles overall</a></td> 
         <td><b>Stands alone</b> </td>
        </tr> 
        <tr> 
         <td>2000–2012</td> 
         <td><a href="/wiki/Tennis_at_the_Summer_Olympics#Multiple_medal_winners_(1896–2016)" title="Tennis at the Summer Olympics">4 Olympic Gold Medals overall</a></td> 
         <td><a href="/wiki/Venus_Williams" title="Venus Williams">Venus Williams</a> </td>
        </tr> 
        <tr> 
         <td>2000–2012</td> 
         <td><a href="/wiki/Tennis_at_the_Summer_Olympics#Multiple_medal_winners_(1896–2016)" title="Tennis at the Summer Olympics">3 Olympic Gold Medals in Doubles</a> (with <a href="/wiki/Venus_Williams" title="Venus Williams">Venus Williams</a>)</td> 
         <td><a href="/wiki/Venus_Williams" title="Venus Williams">Venus Williams</a> </td>
        </tr> 
        <tr> 
         <td>2000–2016</td> 
         <td><a href="/wiki/List_of_Olympic_medalists_in_tennis#Doubles_(women)" title="List of Olympic medalists in tennis">93.75% (15–1) Olympic match winning record in doubles</a> (with <a href="/wiki/Venus_Williams" title="Venus Williams">Venus Williams</a>)</td> 
         <td><a href="/wiki/Venus_Williams" title="Venus Williams">Venus Williams</a> </td>
        </tr> 
        <tr> 
         <td>2001, 2012</td> 
         <td><a href="/wiki/Open_Era_tennis_records_%E2%80%93_women%27s_singles#Year-End_Championships" class="mw-redirect" title="Open Era tennis records – women's singles">Two Year-End Championships won without losing a set</a></td> 
         <td><a href="/wiki/Martina_Navratilova" title="Martina Navratilova">Martina Navratilova</a> </td>
        </tr> 
        <tr> 
         <td>2001–2015</td> 
         <td><a href="/wiki/Open_Era_tennis_records_%E2%80%93_women%27s_singles#Year-End_Championships" class="mw-redirect" title="Open Era tennis records – women's singles">Winning percentage of 82.86% at Year-End Championships</a></td> 
         <td><b>Stands alone</b> </td>
        </tr> 
        <tr> 
         <td>1995–2017</td> 
         <td><a href="/wiki/List_of_WTA_Tour_players_by_career_prize_money" class="mw-redirect" title="List of WTA Tour players by career prize money">$84,463,131 prize money overall</a></td> 
         <td><b>Stands alone</b> </td>
        </tr>
       </tbody>
      </table>

      <h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Bibliography">Bibliography</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=Serena_Williams&amp;action=edit&amp;section=51" title="Edit section: Bibliography">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2> 
      <ul>
       <li><cite id="CITEREFMorgan2001" class="citation book">Morgan, Terri (2001). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=GaphSm9ndMsC"><i>Venus and Serena Williams: Grand Slam Sisters</i></a>.                 <td style="width: 40%; text-align: center;" rowspan="1"><b> <a href="/wiki/WTA_Awards" title="WTA Awards">WTA Player of The Year</a></b><br><a href="/wiki/2002_WTA_Tour" title="2002 WTA Tour">2002</a><br><a href="/wiki/2008_WTA_Tour" title="2008 WTA Tour">2008</a>, <a href="/wiki/2009_WTA_Tour" title="2009 WTA Tour">2009</a><br><a href="/wiki/2012_WTA_Tour" title="2012 WTA Tour">2012</a> – <a href="/wiki/2015_WTA_Tour" title="2015 WTA Tour">2015</a> </td>

                <td style="width: 30%; text-align: center;" rowspan="1">Succeeded&nbsp;by<br><span style="font-weight: bold">Justine Henin<br>Caroline Wozniacki<br>Angelique Kerber</span> </td>
               </tr> 
               <tr style="text-align:center;"> 
                <td style="width:30%;" rowspan="1">Preceded&nbsp;by<br><span style="font-weight: bold">Jennifer Capriati<br> <a href="/wiki/Candace_Parker" title="Candace Parker">Candace Parker</a><br> <a href="/wiki/Gabby_Douglas" title="Gabby Douglas">Gabby Douglas</a><br>Mo'ne Davis</span> </td>

                <td style="width: 30%; text-align: center;" rowspan="1">Succeeded&nbsp;by<br><span style="font-weight: bold"><a href="/wiki/Annika_S%C3%B6renstam" title="Annika Sörenstam">Annika Sörenstam</a><br> <a href="/wiki/Lindsey_Vonn" title="Lindsey Vonn">Lindsey Vonn</a><br> <a href="/wiki/Mo%27ne_Davis" title="Mo'ne Davis">Mo'ne Davis</a><br> <a href="/wiki/Simone_Biles" title="Simone Biles">Simone Biles</a></span> </td>

                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2006_Australian_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2006 Australian Open – Women's Singles">2006</a>) <a href="/wiki/Am%C3%A9lie_Mauresmo" title="Amélie Mauresmo">Amélie Mauresmo</a></li>

                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2008_Australian_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2008 Australian Open – Women's Singles">2008</a>) <a href="/wiki/Maria_Sharapova" title="Maria Sharapova">Maria Sharapova</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2009_Australian_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2009 Australian Open – Women's Singles">2009</a>) <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Serena Williams</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2010_Australian_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2010 Australian Open – Women's Singles">2010</a>) <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Serena Williams</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2011_Australian_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2011 Australian Open – Women's Singles">2011</a>) <a href="/wiki/Kim_Clijsters" title="Kim Clijsters">Kim Clijsters</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2012_Australian_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2012 Australian Open – Women's Singles">2012</a>) <a href="/wiki/Victoria_Azarenka" title="Victoria Azarenka">Victoria Azarenka</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2013_Australian_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2013 Australian Open – Women's Singles">2013</a>) <a href="/wiki/Victoria_Azarenka" title="Victoria Azarenka">Victoria Azarenka</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2014_Australian_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2014 Australian Open – Women's Singles">2014</a>) <a href="/wiki/Li_Na" title="Li Na">Li Na</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2015_Australian_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2015 Australian Open – Women's Singles">2015</a>) <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Serena Williams</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2016_Australian_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2016 Australian Open – Women's Singles">2016</a>) <a href="/wiki/Angelique_Kerber" title="Angelique Kerber">Angelique Kerber</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2017_Australian_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2017 Australian Open – Women's Singles">2017</a>) <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Serena Williams</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2018_Australian_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2018 Australian Open – Women's Singles">2018</a>) <a href="/wiki/Caroline_Wozniacki" title="Caroline Wozniacki">Caroline Wozniacki</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2019_Australian_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2019 Australian Open – Women's Singles">2019</a>) <a href="/wiki/Naomi_Osaka" title="Naomi Osaka">Naomi Osaka</a></li>
                        </ul> 
                       </div></td>
                     </tr>
                    </tbody>
                   </table>
                  </div>

                        <a href="/wiki/List_of_French_Open_women%27s_singles_champions" title="List of French Open women's singles champions">French Open women's singles champions</a>

                      <th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: #ff915f;;width:1%"><a href="/wiki/History_of_tennis#1891/1925:_French_Open" title="History of tennis">Pre Open Era</a></th>

                          <th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%">National</th>

                           <div style="padding:0em 0.25em"> 
                            <ul>
                             <li>(1897) <a href="/wiki/Adine_Masson" title="Adine Masson">Adine Masson</a></li>

                             <li>(1903) <a href="/wiki/Adine_Masson" title="Adine Masson">Adine Masson</a></li> 
                             <li>(1904) <a href="/wiki/Kate_Gillou" title="Kate Gillou">Kate Gillou</a></li> 
                             <li>(1905) <a href="/wiki/Kate_Gillou" title="Kate Gillou">Kate Gillou</a></li> 
                             <li>(1906) <a href="/wiki/Kate_Gillou" title="Kate Gillou">Kate Gillou-Fenwick</a></li> 
                             <li>(1907) <a href="/wiki/Comtesse_de_Kermel" title="Comtesse de Kermel">Comtesse de Kermel</a></li> 
                             <li>(1908) <a href="/wiki/Kate_Gillou" title="Kate Gillou">Kate Gillou-Fenwick</a></li> 
                             <li>(1909) <a href="/wiki/Jeanne_Matthey" title="Jeanne Matthey">Jeanne Matthey</a></li> 
                             <li>(1910) <a href="/wiki/Jeanne_Matthey" title="Jeanne Matthey">Jeanne Matthey</a></li> 
                             <li>(1911) <a href="/wiki/Jeanne_Matthey" title="Jeanne Matthey">Jeanne Matthey</a></li> 
                             <li>(1912) <a href="/wiki/Jeanne_Matthey" title="Jeanne Matthey">Jeanne Matthey</a></li> 
                             <li>(1913) <a href="/wiki/Marguerite_Broquedis" title="Marguerite Broquedis">Marguerite Broquedis</a></li> 
                             <li>(1914) <a href="/wiki/Marguerite_Broquedis" title="Marguerite Broquedis">Marguerite Broquedis</a></li> 
                             <li>(1915–1919) No competition (due to <a href="/wiki/World_War_I" title="World War I">World War I</a>)</li> 
                             <li>(1920) <a href="/wiki/Suzanne_Lenglen" title="Suzanne Lenglen">Suzanne Lenglen</a></li> 
                             <li>(1921) <a href="/wiki/Suzanne_Lenglen" title="Suzanne Lenglen">Suzanne Lenglen</a></li>

                             <li>(<a href="/wiki/1937_French_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1937 French Championships – Women's Singles">1937</a>) <a href="/wiki/Hilde_Krahwinkel_Sperling" title="Hilde Krahwinkel Sperling">Hilde Krahwinkel Sperling</a></li>

                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1971_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1971 French Open – Women's Singles">1971</a>) <a href="/wiki/Evonne_Goolagong" class="mw-redirect" title="Evonne Goolagong">Evonne Goolagong</a></li>

                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1973_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1973 French Open – Women's Singles">1973</a>) <a href="/wiki/Margaret_Court" title="Margaret Court">Margaret Court</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1974_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1974 French Open – Women's Singles">1974</a>) <a href="/wiki/Chris_Evert" title="Chris Evert">Chris Evert</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1975_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1975 French Open – Women's Singles">1975</a>) <a href="/wiki/Chris_Evert" title="Chris Evert">Chris Evert</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1976_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1976 French Open – Women's Singles">1976</a>) <a href="/wiki/Sue_Barker" title="Sue Barker">Sue Barker</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1977_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1977 French Open – Women's Singles">1977</a>) <a href="/wiki/Mima_Jau%C5%A1ovec" title="Mima Jaušovec">Mima Jaušovec</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1978_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1978 French Open – Women's Singles">1978</a>) <a href="/wiki/Virginia_Ruzici" title="Virginia Ruzici">Virginia Ruzici</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1979_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1979 French Open – Women's Singles">1979</a>) <a href="/wiki/Chris_Evert" title="Chris Evert">Chris Evert</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1980_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1980 French Open – Women's Singles">1980</a>) <a href="/wiki/Chris_Evert" title="Chris Evert">Chris Evert</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1981_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1981 French Open – Women's Singles">1981</a>) <a href="/wiki/Hana_Mandl%C3%ADkov%C3%A1" title="Hana Mandlíková">Hana Mandlíková</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1982_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1982 French Open – Women's Singles">1982</a>) <a href="/wiki/Martina_Navratilova" title="Martina Navratilova">Martina Navratilova</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1983_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1983 French Open – Women's Singles">1983</a>) <a href="/wiki/Chris_Evert" title="Chris Evert">Chris Evert</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1984_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1984 French Open – Women's Singles">1984</a>) <a href="/wiki/Martina_Navratilova" title="Martina Navratilova">Martina Navratilova</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1985_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1985 French Open – Women's Singles">1985</a>) <a href="/wiki/Chris_Evert" title="Chris Evert">Chris Evert</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1986_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1986 French Open – Women's Singles">1986</a>) <a href="/wiki/Chris_Evert" title="Chris Evert">Chris Evert</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1987_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1987 French Open – Women's Singles">1987</a>) <a href="/wiki/Steffi_Graf" title="Steffi Graf">Steffi Graf</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1988_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1988 French Open – Women's Singles">1988</a>) <a href="/wiki/Steffi_Graf" title="Steffi Graf">Steffi Graf</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1989_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1989 French Open – Women's Singles">1989</a>) <a href="/wiki/Arantxa_S%C3%A1nchez_Vicario" title="Arantxa Sánchez Vicario">Arantxa Sánchez</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1990_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1990 French Open – Women's Singles">1990</a>) <a href="/wiki/Monica_Seles" title="Monica Seles">Monica Seles</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1991_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1991 French Open – Women's Singles">1991</a>) <a href="/wiki/Monica_Seles" title="Monica Seles">Monica Seles</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1992_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1992 French Open – Women's Singles">1992</a>) <a href="/wiki/Monica_Seles" title="Monica Seles">Monica Seles</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1993_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1993 French Open – Women's Singles">1993</a>) <a href="/wiki/Steffi_Graf" title="Steffi Graf">Steffi Graf</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1994_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1994 French Open – Women's Singles">1994</a>) <a href="/wiki/Arantxa_S%C3%A1nchez_Vicario" title="Arantxa Sánchez Vicario">Arantxa Sánchez Vicario</a></li>

                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2005_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2005 French Open – Women's Singles">2005</a>) <a href="/wiki/Justine_Henin" title="Justine Henin">Justine Henin</a></li>

                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2008_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2008 French Open – Women's Singles">2008</a>) <a href="/wiki/Ana_Ivanovic" title="Ana Ivanovic">Ana Ivanovic</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2009_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2009 French Open – Women's Singles">2009</a>) <a href="/wiki/Svetlana_Kuznetsova" title="Svetlana Kuznetsova">Svetlana Kuznetsova</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2010_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2010 French Open – Women's Singles">2010</a>) <a href="/wiki/Francesca_Schiavone" title="Francesca Schiavone">Francesca Schiavone</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2011_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2011 French Open – Women's Singles">2011</a>) <a href="/wiki/Li_Na" title="Li Na">Li Na</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2012_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2012 French Open – Women's Singles">2012</a>) <a href="/wiki/Maria_Sharapova" title="Maria Sharapova">Maria Sharapova</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2013_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2013 French Open – Women's Singles">2013</a>) <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Serena Williams</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2014_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2014 French Open – Women's Singles">2014</a>) <a href="/wiki/Maria_Sharapova" title="Maria Sharapova">Maria Sharapova</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2015_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2015 French Open – Women's Singles">2015</a>) <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Serena Williams</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2016_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2016 French Open – Women's Singles">2016</a>) <a href="/wiki/Garbi%C3%B1e_Muguruza" title="Garbiñe Muguruza">Garbiñe Muguruza</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2017_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2017 French Open – Women's Singles">2017</a>) <a href="/wiki/Je%C4%BCena_Ostapenko" title="Jeļena Ostapenko">Jeļena Ostapenko</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2018_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2018 French Open – Women's Singles">2018</a>) <a href="/wiki/Simona_Halep" title="Simona Halep">Simona Halep</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2019_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="2019 French Open – Women's Singles">2019</a>) <a href="/wiki/Ashleigh_Barty" title="Ashleigh Barty">Ashleigh Barty</a></li>
                        </ul> 
                       </div></td>
                     </tr>
                    </tbody>
                   </table>
                  </div>

                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1937_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1937 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1937</a>) <a href="/wiki/Dorothy_Round" title="Dorothy Round">Dorothy Round</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1938_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1938 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1938</a>) <a href="/wiki/Helen_Wills" title="Helen Wills">Helen Wills Moody</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1939_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1939 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1939</a>) <a href="/wiki/Alice_Marble" title="Alice Marble">Alice Marble</a></li> 
                         <li>(1940–45) No competition (due to <a href="/wiki/World_War_II" title="World War II">World War II</a>)</li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1946_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1946 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1946</a>) <a href="/wiki/Pauline_Betz" title="Pauline Betz">Pauline Addie</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1947_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1947 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1947</a>) <a href="/wiki/Margaret_Osborne_duPont" title="Margaret Osborne duPont">Margaret Osborne</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1948_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1948 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1948</a>) <a href="/wiki/Louise_Brough" title="Louise Brough">Louise Brough</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1949_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1949 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1949</a>) <a href="/wiki/Louise_Brough" title="Louise Brough">Louise Brough</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1950_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1950 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1950</a>) <a href="/wiki/Louise_Brough" title="Louise Brough">Louise Brough</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1951_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1951 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1951</a>) <a href="/wiki/Doris_Hart" title="Doris Hart">Doris Hart</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1952_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1952 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1952</a>) <a href="/wiki/Maureen_Connolly" title="Maureen Connolly">Maureen Connolly</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1953_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1953 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1953</a>) <a href="/wiki/Maureen_Connolly" title="Maureen Connolly">Maureen Connolly</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1954_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1954 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1954</a>) <a href="/wiki/Maureen_Connolly" title="Maureen Connolly">Maureen Connolly</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1955_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1955 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1955</a>) <a href="/wiki/Louise_Brough" title="Louise Brough">Louise Brough</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1956_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1956 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1956</a>) <a href="/wiki/Shirley_Fry" title="Shirley Fry">Shirley Fry</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1957_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1957 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1957</a>) <a href="/wiki/Althea_Gibson" title="Althea Gibson">Althea Gibson</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1958_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1958 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1958</a>) <a href="/wiki/Althea_Gibson" title="Althea Gibson">Althea Gibson</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1959_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1959 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1959</a>) <a href="/wiki/Maria_Bueno" title="Maria Bueno">Maria Bueno</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1960_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1960 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1960</a>) <a href="/wiki/Maria_Bueno" title="Maria Bueno">Maria Bueno</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1961_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1961 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1961</a>) <a href="/wiki/Angela_Mortimer" title="Angela Mortimer">Angela Mortimer</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1962_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1962 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1962</a>) <a href="/wiki/Karen_Hantze_Susman" title="Karen Hantze Susman">Karen Hantze Susman</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1963_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1963 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1963</a>) <a href="/wiki/Margaret_Court" title="Margaret Court">Margaret Smith</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1964_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1964 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1964</a>) <a href="/wiki/Maria_Bueno" title="Maria Bueno">Maria Bueno</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1965_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1965 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles">1965</a>) <a href="/wiki/Margaret_Court" title="Margaret Court">Margaret Smith</a></li>

                        </ul> 
                       </div></td>
                     </tr>

                         <li><span class="nowrap">(<a href="/wiki/1973_US_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Singles" title="1973 US Open – Women's Singles">1973</a>) <a href="/wiki/Margaret_Court" title="Margaret Court">Margaret Court</a></span></li>

                         <li>(2008) <a href="/wiki/Alona_Bondarenko" title="Alona Bondarenko">Alona Bondarenko</a> / <a href="/wiki/Kateryna_Bondarenko" title="Kateryna Bondarenko">Kateryna Bondarenko</a></li> 
                         <li>(2009) <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Serena Williams</a> / <a href="/wiki/Venus_Williams" title="Venus Williams">Venus Williams</a></li> 
                         <li>(2010) <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Serena Williams</a> / <a href="/wiki/Venus_Williams" title="Venus Williams">Venus Williams</a></li> 
                         <li>(2011) <a href="/wiki/Gisela_Dulko" title="Gisela Dulko">Gisela Dulko</a> / <a href="/wiki/Flavia_Pennetta" title="Flavia Pennetta">Flavia Pennetta</a></li> 
                         <li>(2012) <a href="/wiki/Svetlana_Kuznetsova" title="Svetlana Kuznetsova">Svetlana Kuznetsova</a> / <a href="/wiki/Vera_Zvonareva" title="Vera Zvonareva">Vera Zvonareva</a></li> 
                         <li>(2013) <a href="/wiki/Sara_Errani" title="Sara Errani">Sara Errani</a> / <a href="/wiki/Roberta_Vinci" title="Roberta Vinci">Roberta Vinci</a></li> 
                         <li>(2014) <a href="/wiki/Sara_Errani" title="Sara Errani">Sara Errani</a> / <a href="/wiki/Roberta_Vinci" title="Roberta Vinci">Roberta Vinci</a></li> 
                         <li>(2015) <a href="/wiki/Bethanie_Mattek-Sands" title="Bethanie Mattek-Sands">Bethanie Mattek-Sands</a> / <a href="/wiki/Lucie_%C5%A0af%C3%A1%C5%99ov%C3%A1" title="Lucie Šafářová">Lucie Šafářová</a></li> 
                         <li>(2016) <a href="/wiki/Martina_Hingis" title="Martina Hingis">Martina Hingis</a> / <a href="/wiki/Sania_Mirza" title="Sania Mirza">Sania Mirza</a></li> 
                         <li>(2017) <a href="/wiki/Bethanie_Mattek-Sands" title="Bethanie Mattek-Sands">Bethanie Mattek-Sands</a> / <a href="/wiki/Lucie_%C5%A0af%C3%A1%C5%99ov%C3%A1" title="Lucie Šafářová">Lucie Šafářová</a></li> 
                         <li>(2018) <a href="/wiki/T%C3%ADmea_Babos" title="Tímea Babos">Tímea Babos</a> / <a href="/wiki/Kristina_Mladenovic" title="Kristina Mladenovic">Kristina Mladenovic</a></li> 
                         <li>(2019) <a href="/wiki/Samantha_Stosur" title="Samantha Stosur">Samantha Stosur</a> / <a href="/wiki/Zhang_Shuai_(tennis)" title="Zhang Shuai (tennis)">Zhang Shuai</a></li>
                        </ul> 
                       </div></td>
                     </tr>
                    </tbody>
                   </table>
                  </div>

                          <th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%">National</th>

                            <ul>
                             <li>(1907) <a href="/wiki/Adine_Masson" title="Adine Masson">Adine Masson</a> / <a href="/w/index.php?title=Yvonne_de_Ploffel&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Yvonne de Ploffel (page does not exist)">Yvonne de Ploffel</a></li> 
                             <li>(1908) <a href="/wiki/Kate_Gillou" title="Kate Gillou">Kate Gillou-Fenwick</a> / <a href="/w/index.php?title=Cecile_Matthey&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Cecile Matthey (page does not exist)">Cecile Matthey</a></li>

                             <li>(1910) <a href="/wiki/Jeanne_Matthey" title="Jeanne Matthey">Jeanne Matthey</a> / <a href="/wiki/Daisy_Speranza" title="Daisy Speranza">Daisy Speranza</a></li> 
                             <li>(1911) <a href="/wiki/Jeanne_Matthey" title="Jeanne Matthey">Jeanne Matthey</a> / <a href="/wiki/Daisy_Speranza" title="Daisy Speranza">Daisy Speranza</a></li> 
                             <li>(1912) <a href="/wiki/Jeanne_Matthey" title="Jeanne Matthey">Jeanne Matthey</a> / <a href="/wiki/Daisy_Speranza" title="Daisy Speranza">Daisy Speranza</a></li> 
                             <li>(1913) <a href="/wiki/Blanche_Amblard" title="Blanche Amblard">Blanche Amblard</a> / <a href="/wiki/Suzanne_Amblard" title="Suzanne Amblard">Suzanne Amblard</a></li> 
                             <li>(1914) <a href="/wiki/Blanche_Amblard" title="Blanche Amblard">Blanche Amblard</a> / <a href="/wiki/Suzanne_Amblard" title="Suzanne Amblard">Suzanne Amblard</a></li>

                             <li>(1922) <a href="/wiki/Suzanne_Lenglen" title="Suzanne Lenglen">Suzanne Lenglen</a> / <a href="/w/index.php?title=Geramine_Pigueron&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Geramine Pigueron (page does not exist)">Geramine Pigueron</a></li> 
                             <li>(1923) <a href="/wiki/Suzanne_Lenglen" title="Suzanne Lenglen">Suzanne Lenglen</a> / <a href="/wiki/Julie_Vlasto" title="Julie Vlasto">Julie Vlasto</a></li>

                        <ul>
                         <li>(1968) <a href="/wiki/Fran%C3%A7oise_D%C3%BCrr" title="Françoise Dürr">Françoise Dürr</a> / <a href="/wiki/Ann_Haydon-Jones" class="mw-redirect" title="Ann Haydon-Jones">Ann Haydon-Jones</a></li> 
                         <li>(1969) <a href="/wiki/Fran%C3%A7oise_D%C3%BCrr" title="Françoise Dürr">Françoise Dürr</a> / <a href="/wiki/Ann_Haydon-Jones" class="mw-redirect" title="Ann Haydon-Jones">Ann Haydon-Jones</a></li> 
                         <li>(1970) <a href="/wiki/Gail_Chanfreau" title="Gail Chanfreau">Gail Chanfreau</a> / <a href="/wiki/Fran%C3%A7oise_D%C3%BCrr" title="Françoise Dürr">Françoise Dürr</a></li> 
                         <li>(1971) <a href="/wiki/Gail_Chanfreau" title="Gail Chanfreau">Gail Chanfreau</a> / <a href="/wiki/Fran%C3%A7oise_D%C3%BCrr" title="Françoise Dürr">Françoise Dürr</a></li> 
                         <li>(1972) <a href="/wiki/Billie_Jean_King" title="Billie Jean King">Billie Jean King</a> / <a href="/wiki/Betty_St%C3%B6ve" title="Betty Stöve">Betty Stöve</a></li> 
                         <li>(1973) <a href="/wiki/Margaret_Court" title="Margaret Court">Margaret Court</a> / <a href="/wiki/Virginia_Wade" title="Virginia Wade">Virginia Wade</a></li> 
                         <li>(1974) <a href="/wiki/Chris_Evert" title="Chris Evert">Chris Evert</a> / <a href="/wiki/Olga_Morozova" title="Olga Morozova">Olga Morozova</a></li> 
                         <li>(1975) <a href="/wiki/Chris_Evert" title="Chris Evert">Chris Evert</a> / <a href="/wiki/Martina_Navratilova" title="Martina Navratilova">Martina Navratilova</a></li> 
                         <li>(1976) <a href="/wiki/Fiorella_Bonicelli" title="Fiorella Bonicelli">Fiorella Bonicelli</a> / <a href="/wiki/Gail_Chanfreau" title="Gail Chanfreau">Gail Chanfreau</a></li> 
                         <li>(1977) <a href="/wiki/Regina_Mar%C5%A1%C3%ADkov%C3%A1" title="Regina Maršíková">Regina Maršíková</a> / <a href="/wiki/Pam_Teeguarden" title="Pam Teeguarden">Pam Teeguarden</a></li> 
                         <li>(1978) <a href="/wiki/Mima_Jau%C5%A1ovec" title="Mima Jaušovec">Mima Jaušovec</a> / <a href="/wiki/Virginia_Ruzici" title="Virginia Ruzici">Virginia Ruzici</a></li> 
                         <li>(1979) <a href="/wiki/Betty_St%C3%B6ve" title="Betty Stöve">Betty Stöve</a> / <a href="/wiki/Wendy_Turnbull" title="Wendy Turnbull">Wendy Turnbull</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1980_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="1980 French Open – Women's Doubles">1980</a>) <a href="/wiki/Kathy_Jordan" title="Kathy Jordan">Kathy Jordan</a> / <a href="/wiki/Anne_Smith" title="Anne Smith">Anne Smith</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1981_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="1981 French Open – Women's Doubles">1981</a>) <a href="/wiki/Rosalyn_Fairbank" title="Rosalyn Fairbank">Rosalyn Fairbank Nideffer</a> / <a href="/wiki/Tanya_Harford" title="Tanya Harford">Tanya Harford</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1982_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="1982 French Open – Women's Doubles">1982</a>) <a href="/wiki/Martina_Navratilova" title="Martina Navratilova">Martina Navratilova</a> / <a href="/wiki/Anne_Smith" title="Anne Smith">Anne Smith</a></li> 
                         <li>(1983) <a href="/wiki/Rosalyn_Fairbank" title="Rosalyn Fairbank">Rosalyn Fairbank Nideffer</a> / <a href="/wiki/Candy_Reynolds" title="Candy Reynolds">Candy Reynolds</a></li> 
                         <li>(1984) <a href="/wiki/Martina_Navratilova" title="Martina Navratilova">Martina Navratilova</a> / <a href="/wiki/Pam_Shriver" title="Pam Shriver">Pam Shriver</a></li> 
                         <li>(1985) <a href="/wiki/Martina_Navratilova" title="Martina Navratilova">Martina Navratilova</a> / <a href="/wiki/Pam_Shriver" title="Pam Shriver">Pam Shriver</a></li> 
                         <li>(1986) <a href="/wiki/Martina_Navratilova" title="Martina Navratilova">Martina Navratilova</a> / <a href="/wiki/Andrea_Temesv%C3%A1ri" title="Andrea Temesvári">Andrea Temesvári</a></li> 
                         <li>(1987) <a href="/wiki/Martina_Navratilova" title="Martina Navratilova">Martina Navratilova</a> / <a href="/wiki/Pam_Shriver" title="Pam Shriver">Pam Shriver</a></li> 
                         <li>(1988) <a href="/wiki/Martina_Navratilova" title="Martina Navratilova">Martina Navratilova</a> / <a href="/wiki/Pam_Shriver" title="Pam Shriver">Pam Shriver</a></li> 
                         <li>(1989) <a href="/wiki/Larisa_Neiland" title="Larisa Neiland">Larisa Savchenko Neiland</a> / <a href="/wiki/Natasha_Zvereva" title="Natasha Zvereva">Natalia Zvereva</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1990_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="1990 French Open – Women's Doubles">1990</a>) <a href="/wiki/Jana_Novotn%C3%A1" title="Jana Novotná">Jana Novotná</a> / <a href="/wiki/Helena_Sukov%C3%A1" title="Helena Suková">Helena Suková</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1991_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="1991 French Open – Women's Doubles">1991</a>) <a href="/wiki/Gigi_Fern%C3%A1ndez" title="Gigi Fernández">Gigi Fernández</a> / <a href="/wiki/Jana_Novotn%C3%A1" title="Jana Novotná">Jana Novotná</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1992_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="1992 French Open – Women's Doubles">1992</a>) <a href="/wiki/Gigi_Fern%C3%A1ndez" title="Gigi Fernández">Gigi Fernández</a> / <a href="/wiki/Natasha_Zvereva" title="Natasha Zvereva">Natalia Zvereva</a></li> 
                         <li>(1993) <a href="/wiki/Gigi_Fern%C3%A1ndez" title="Gigi Fernández">Gigi Fernández</a> / <a href="/wiki/Natasha_Zvereva" title="Natasha Zvereva">Natalia Zvereva</a></li> 
                         <li>(1994) <a href="/wiki/Gigi_Fern%C3%A1ndez" title="Gigi Fernández">Gigi Fernández</a> / <a href="/wiki/Natasha_Zvereva" title="Natasha Zvereva">Natalia Zvereva</a></li> 
                         <li>(1995) <a href="/wiki/Gigi_Fern%C3%A1ndez" title="Gigi Fernández">Gigi Fernández</a> / <a href="/wiki/Natasha_Zvereva" title="Natasha Zvereva">Natalia Zvereva</a></li> 
                         <li>(1996) <a href="/wiki/Lindsay_Davenport" title="Lindsay Davenport">Lindsay Davenport</a> / <a href="/wiki/Mary_Joe_Fern%C3%A1ndez" title="Mary Joe Fernández">Mary Joe Fernández</a></li> 
                         <li>(1997) <a href="/wiki/Gigi_Fern%C3%A1ndez" title="Gigi Fernández">Gigi Fernández</a> / <a href="/wiki/Natasha_Zvereva" title="Natasha Zvereva">Natalia Zvereva</a></li> 
                         <li>(1998) <a href="/wiki/Martina_Hingis" title="Martina Hingis">Martina Hingis</a> / <a href="/wiki/Jana_Novotn%C3%A1" title="Jana Novotná">Jana Novotná</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1999_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="1999 French Open – Women's Doubles">1999</a>) <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Serena Williams</a> / <a href="/wiki/Venus_Williams" title="Venus Williams">Venus Williams</a></li> 
                         <li>(2000) <a href="/wiki/Martina_Hingis" title="Martina Hingis">Martina Hingis</a> / <a href="/wiki/Mary_Pierce" title="Mary Pierce">Mary Pierce</a></li> 
                         <li>(2001) <a href="/wiki/Virginia_Ruano_Pascual" title="Virginia Ruano Pascual">Virginia Ruano Pascual</a> / <a href="/wiki/Paola_Su%C3%A1rez" title="Paola Suárez">Paola Suárez</a></li> 
                         <li>(2002) <a href="/wiki/Virginia_Ruano_Pascual" title="Virginia Ruano Pascual">Virginia Ruano Pascual</a> / <a href="/wiki/Paola_Su%C3%A1rez" title="Paola Suárez">Paola Suárez</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2003_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="2003 French Open – Women's Doubles">2003</a>) <a href="/wiki/Kim_Clijsters" title="Kim Clijsters">Kim Clijsters</a> / <a href="/wiki/Ai_Sugiyama" title="Ai Sugiyama">Ai Sugiyama</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2004_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="2004 French Open – Women's Doubles">2004</a>) <a href="/wiki/Virginia_Ruano_Pascual" title="Virginia Ruano Pascual">Virginia Ruano Pascual</a> / <a href="/wiki/Paola_Su%C3%A1rez" title="Paola Suárez">Paola Suárez</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2005_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="2005 French Open – Women's Doubles">2005</a>) <a href="/wiki/Virginia_Ruano_Pascual" title="Virginia Ruano Pascual">Virginia Ruano Pascual</a> / <a href="/wiki/Paola_Su%C3%A1rez" title="Paola Suárez">Paola Suárez</a></li>

                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2008_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="2008 French Open – Women's Doubles">2008</a>) <a href="/wiki/Anabel_Medina_Garrigues" title="Anabel Medina Garrigues">Anabel Medina Garrigues</a> / <a href="/wiki/Virginia_Ruano_Pascual" title="Virginia Ruano Pascual">Virginia Ruano Pascual</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2009_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="2009 French Open – Women's Doubles">2009</a>) <a href="/wiki/Anabel_Medina_Garrigues" title="Anabel Medina Garrigues">Anabel Medina Garrigues</a> / <a href="/wiki/Virginia_Ruano_Pascual" title="Virginia Ruano Pascual">Virginia Ruano Pascual</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2010_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="2010 French Open – Women's Doubles">2010</a>) <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Serena Williams</a> / <a href="/wiki/Venus_Williams" title="Venus Williams">Venus Williams</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2011_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="2011 French Open – Women's Doubles">2011</a>) <a href="/wiki/Andrea_Hlav%C3%A1%C4%8Dkov%C3%A1" class="mw-redirect" title="Andrea Hlaváčková">Andrea Hlaváčková</a> / <a href="/wiki/Lucie_Hradeck%C3%A1" title="Lucie Hradecká">Lucie Hradecká</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2012_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="2012 French Open – Women's Doubles">2012</a>) <a href="/wiki/Sara_Errani" title="Sara Errani">Sara Errani</a> / <a href="/wiki/Roberta_Vinci" title="Roberta Vinci">Roberta Vinci</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2013_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="2013 French Open – Women's Doubles">2013</a>) <a href="/wiki/Ekaterina_Makarova" title="Ekaterina Makarova">Ekaterina Makarova</a> / <a href="/wiki/Elena_Vesnina" title="Elena Vesnina">Elena Vesnina</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2014_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="2014 French Open – Women's Doubles">2014</a>) <a href="/wiki/Hsieh_Su-wei" title="Hsieh Su-wei">Hsieh Su-wei</a> / <a href="/wiki/Peng_Shuai" title="Peng Shuai">Peng Shuai</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2015_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="2015 French Open – Women's Doubles">2015</a>) <a href="/wiki/Bethanie_Mattek-Sands" title="Bethanie Mattek-Sands">Bethanie Mattek-Sands</a> / <a href="/wiki/Lucie_%C5%A0af%C3%A1%C5%99ov%C3%A1" title="Lucie Šafářová">Lucie Šafářová</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2016_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="2016 French Open – Women's Doubles">2016</a>) <a href="/wiki/Caroline_Garcia" title="Caroline Garcia">Caroline Garcia</a> / <a href="/wiki/Kristina_Mladenovic" title="Kristina Mladenovic">Kristina Mladenovic</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2017_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="2017 French Open – Women's Doubles">2017</a>) <a href="/wiki/Bethanie_Mattek-Sands" title="Bethanie Mattek-Sands">Bethanie Mattek-Sands</a> / <a href="/wiki/Lucie_%C5%A0af%C3%A1%C5%99ov%C3%A1" title="Lucie Šafářová">Lucie Šafářová</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2018_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="2018 French Open – Women's Doubles">2018</a>) <a href="/wiki/Barbora_Krej%C4%8D%C3%ADkov%C3%A1" title="Barbora Krejčíková">Barbora Krejčíková</a> / <a href="/wiki/Kate%C5%99ina_Siniakov%C3%A1" title="Kateřina Siniaková">Kateřina Siniaková</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/2019_French_Open_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="2019 French Open – Women's Doubles">2019</a>) <a href="/wiki/T%C3%ADmea_Babos" title="Tímea Babos">Tímea Babos</a> / <a href="/wiki/Kristina_Mladenovic" title="Kristina Mladenovic">Kristina Mladenovic</a></li>
                        </ul> 
                       </div></td>
                     </tr>
                    </tbody>
                   </table>
                  </div>

                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1959_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="1959 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Doubles">1959</a>) <a href="/wiki/Jeanne_Arth" title="Jeanne Arth">Jeanne Arth</a> / <a href="/wiki/Darlene_Hard" title="Darlene Hard">Darlene Hard</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1960_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="1960 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Doubles">1960</a>) <a href="/wiki/Maria_Bueno" title="Maria Bueno">Maria Bueno</a> / <a href="/wiki/Darlene_Hard" title="Darlene Hard">Darlene Hard</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1961_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="1961 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Doubles">1961</a>) <a href="/wiki/Karen_Hantze_Susman" title="Karen Hantze Susman">Karen Hantze Susman</a> / <a href="/wiki/Billie_Jean_King" title="Billie Jean King">Billie Jean Moffitt</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1962_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="1962 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Doubles">1962</a>) <a href="/wiki/Karen_Hantze_Susman" title="Karen Hantze Susman">Karen Hantze Susman</a> / <a href="/wiki/Billie_Jean_King" title="Billie Jean King">Billie Jean Moffitt</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1963_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="1963 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Doubles">1963</a>) <a href="/wiki/Maria_Bueno" title="Maria Bueno">Maria Bueno</a> / <a href="/wiki/Darlene_Hard" title="Darlene Hard">Darlene Hard</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1964_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="1964 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Doubles">1964</a>) <a href="/wiki/Margaret_Court" title="Margaret Court">Margaret Court</a> / <a href="/wiki/Lesley_Turner_Bowrey" title="Lesley Turner Bowrey">Lesley Turner Bowrey</a></li> 
                         <li>(<a href="/wiki/1965_Wimbledon_Championships_%E2%80%93_Women%27s_Doubles" title="1965 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Doubles">1965</a>) <a href="/wiki/Maria_Bueno" title="Maria Bueno">Maria Bueno</a> / <a href="/wiki/Billie_Jean_King" title="Billie Jean King">Billie Jean Moffitt</a></li>

                        </ul> 
                       </div></td>
                     </tr>

                         <li>(1970) <a href="/wiki/Margaret_Court" title="Margaret Court">Margaret Court</a> / <a href="/wiki/Judy_Tegart" class="mw-redirect" title="Judy Tegart">Judy Tegart Dalton</a></li> 
                         <li>(1971) <a href="/wiki/Rosemary_Casals" title="Rosemary Casals">Rosemary Casals</a> / <a href="/wiki/Judy_Tegart" class="mw-redirect" title="Judy Tegart">Judy Tegart Dalton</a></li> 
                         <li>(1972) <a href="/wiki/Fran%C3%A7oise_D%C3%BCrr" title="Françoise Dürr">Françoise Dürr</a> / <a href="/wiki/Betty_St%C3%B6ve" title="Betty Stöve">Betty Stöve</a></li> 
                         <li>(1973) <a href="/wiki/Margaret_Court" title="Margaret Court">Margaret Court</a> / <a href="/wiki/Virginia_Wade" title="Virginia Wade">Virginia Wade</a></li> 
                         <li>(1974) <a href="/wiki/Rosemary_Casals" title="Rosemary Casals">Rosemary Casals</a> / <a href="/wiki/Billie_Jean_King" title="Billie Jean King">Billie Jean King</a></li>

                         <li>(1976) <a href="/wiki/Linky_Boshoff" title="Linky Boshoff">Delina Boshoff</a> / <a href="/wiki/Ilana_Kloss" title="Ilana Kloss">Ilana Kloss</a></li>

                         <li>(1979) <a href="/wiki/Betty_St%C3%B6ve" title="Betty Stöve">Betty Stöve</a> / <a href="/wiki/Wendy_Turnbull" title="Wendy Turnbull">Wendy Turnbull</a></li> 
                         <li>(1980) <a href="/wiki/Billie_Jean_King" title="Billie Jean King">Billie Jean King</a> / <a href="/wiki/Martina_Navratilova" title="Martina Navratilova">Martina Navratilova</a></li> 
                         <li>(1981) <a href="/wiki/Kathy_Jordan" title="Kathy Jordan">Kathy Jordan</a> / <a href="/wiki/Anne_Smith" title="Anne Smith">Anne Smith</a></li> 
                         <li>(1982) <a href="/wiki/Rosemary_Casals" title="Rosemary Casals">Rosemary Casals</a> / <a href="/wiki/Wendy_Turnbull" title="Wendy Turnbull">Wendy Turnbull</a></li> 
                         <li>(1983) <a href="/wiki/Martina_Navratilova" title="Martina Navratilova">Martina Navratilova</a> / <a href="/wiki/Pam_Shriver" title="Pam Shriver">Pam Shriver</a></li> 
                         <li>(1984) <a href="/wiki/Martina_Navratilova" title="Martina Navratilova">Martina Navratilova</a> / <a href="/wiki/Pam_Shriver" title="Pam Shriver">Pam Shriver</a></li> 
                         <li>(1985) <a href="/wiki/Claudia_Kohde-Kilsch" title="Claudia Kohde-Kilsch">Claudia Kohde-Kilsch</a> / <a href="/wiki/Helena_Sukov%C3%A1" title="Helena Suková">Helena Suková</a></li> 
                         <li>(1986) <a href="/wiki/Martina_Navratilova" title="Martina Navratilova">Martina Navratilova</a> / <a href="/wiki/Pam_Shriver" title="Pam Shriver">Pam Shriver</a></li> 
                         <li>(1987) <a href="/wiki/Martina_Navratilova" title="Martina Navratilova">Martina Navratilova</a> / <a href="/wiki/Pam_Shriver" title="Pam Shriver">Pam Shriver</a></li> 
                         <li>(1988) <a href="/wiki/Gigi_Fern%C3%A1ndez" title="Gigi Fernández">Gigi Fernández</a> / <a href="/wiki/Robin_White_(tennis)" title="Robin White (tennis)">Robin White</a></li> 
                         <li>(1989) <a href="/wiki/Hana_Mandl%C3%ADkov%C3%A1" title="Hana Mandlíková">Hana Mandlíková</a> / <a href="/wiki/Martina_Navratilova" title="Martina Navratilova">Martina Navratilova</a></li> 
                         <li>(1990) <a href="/wiki/Gigi_Fern%C3%A1ndez" title="Gigi Fernández">Gigi Fernández</a> / <a href="/wiki/Martina_Navratilova" title="Martina Navratilova">Martina Navratilova</a></li> 
                         <li>(1991) <a href="/wiki/Pam_Shriver" title="Pam Shriver">Pam Shriver</a> / <a href="/wiki/Natasha_Zvereva" title="Natasha Zvereva">Natalia Zvereva</a></li> 
                         <li>(1992) <a href="/wiki/Gigi_Fern%C3%A1ndez" title="Gigi Fernández">Gigi Fernández</a> / <a href="/wiki/Natasha_Zvereva" title="Natasha Zvereva">Natalia Zvereva</a></li> 
                         <li>(1993) <a href="/wiki/Arantxa_S%C3%A1nchez_Vicario" title="Arantxa Sánchez Vicario">Arantxa Sánchez Vicario</a> / <a href="/wiki/Helena_Sukov%C3%A1" title="Helena Suková">Helena Suková</a></li> 
                         <li>(1994) <a href="/wiki/Jana_Novotn%C3%A1" title="Jana Novotná">Jana Novotná</a> / <a href="/wiki/Arantxa_S%C3%A1nchez_Vicario" title="Arantxa Sánchez Vicario">Arantxa Sánchez Vicario</a></li> 
                         <li>(1995) <a href="/wiki/Gigi_Fern%C3%A1ndez" title="Gigi Fernández">Gigi Fernández</a> / <a href="/wiki/Natasha_Zvereva" title="Natasha Zvereva">Natalia Zvereva</a></li> 
                         <li>(1996) <a href="/wiki/Gigi_Fern%C3%A1ndez" title="Gigi Fernández">Gigi Fernández</a> / <a href="/wiki/Natasha_Zvereva" title="Natasha Zvereva">Natalia Zvereva</a></li> 
                         <li>(1997) <a href="/wiki/Lindsay_Davenport" title="Lindsay Davenport">Lindsay Davenport</a> / <a href="/wiki/Jana_Novotn%C3%A1" title="Jana Novotná">Jana Novotná</a></li> 
                         <li>(1998) <a href="/wiki/Martina_Hingis" title="Martina Hingis">Martina Hingis</a> / <a href="/wiki/Jana_Novotn%C3%A1" title="Jana Novotná">Jana Novotná</a></li>

                         <li>(2002) <a href="/wiki/Virginia_Ruano_Pascual" title="Virginia Ruano Pascual">Virginia Ruano Pascual</a> / <a href="/wiki/Paola_Su%C3%A1rez" title="Paola Suárez">Paola Suárez</a></li>

                         <li>(2004) <a href="/wiki/Virginia_Ruano_Pascual" title="Virginia Ruano Pascual">Virginia Ruano Pascual</a> / <a href="/wiki/Paola_Su%C3%A1rez" title="Paola Suárez">Paola Suárez</a></li> 
                         <li>(2005) <a href="/wiki/Lisa_Raymond" title="Lisa Raymond">Lisa Raymond</a> / <a href="/wiki/Samantha_Stosur" title="Samantha Stosur">Samantha Stosur</a></li> 
                         <li>(2006) <a href="/wiki/Nathalie_Dechy" title="Nathalie Dechy">Nathalie Dechy</a> / <a href="/wiki/Vera_Zvonareva" title="Vera Zvonareva">Vera Zvonareva</a></li> 
                         <li>(2007) <a href="/wiki/Nathalie_Dechy" title="Nathalie Dechy">Nathalie Dechy</a> / <a href="/wiki/Dinara_Safina" title="Dinara Safina">Dinara Safina</a></li>

                         <li>(2014) <a href="/wiki/Ekaterina_Makarova" title="Ekaterina Makarova">Ekaterina Makarova</a> / <a href="/wiki/Elena_Vesnina" title="Elena Vesnina">Elena Vesnina</a></li> 
                         <li>(2015) <a href="/wiki/Martina_Hingis" title="Martina Hingis">Martina Hingis</a> / <a href="/wiki/Sania_Mirza" title="Sania Mirza">Sania Mirza</a></li> 
                         <li>(2016) <a href="/wiki/Bethanie_Mattek-Sands" title="Bethanie Mattek-Sands">Bethanie Mattek-Sands</a> / <a href="/wiki/Lucie_%C5%A0af%C3%A1%C5%99ov%C3%A1" title="Lucie Šafářová">Lucie Šafářová</a></li> 
                         <li>(2017) <a href="/wiki/Latisha_Chan" title="Latisha Chan">Chan Yung-jan</a> / <a href="/wiki/Martina_Hingis" title="Martina Hingis">Martina Hingis</a></li> 
                         <li>(2018) <a href="/wiki/Ashleigh_Barty" title="Ashleigh Barty">Ashleigh Barty</a> / <a href="/wiki/CoCo_Vandeweghe" title="CoCo Vandeweghe">CoCo Vandeweghe</a></li> 
                         <li>(2019) <a href="/wiki/Elise_Mertens" title="Elise Mertens">Elise Mertens</a> / <a href="/wiki/Aryna_Sabalenka" title="Aryna Sabalenka">Aryna Sabalenka</a></li>
                        </ul>

                         <li>1926: <a href="/wiki/Leslie_Godfree" title="Leslie Godfree">Leslie Godfree</a> / <a href="/wiki/Kathleen_McKane_Godfree" title="Kathleen McKane Godfree">Kathleen McKane Godfree</a></li>

                         <li>1931: <a href="/wiki/George_Lott" title="George Lott">George Lott</a> / <a href="/wiki/Anna_McCune_Harper" title="Anna McCune Harper">Anna McCune Harper</a></li> 
                         <li>1932: <a href="/wiki/Enrique_Maier" title="Enrique Maier">Enrique Maier</a> / <a href="/wiki/Elizabeth_Ryan" title="Elizabeth Ryan">Elizabeth Ryan</a></li> 
                         <li>1933: <a href="/wiki/Gottfried_von_Cramm" title="Gottfried von Cramm">Gottfried von Cramm</a> / <a href="/wiki/Hilde_Krahwinkel_Sperling" title="Hilde Krahwinkel Sperling">Hilde Krahwinkel Sperling</a></li> 
                         <li>1934: <a href="/wiki/Ryuki_Miki" title="Ryuki Miki">Ryuki Miki</a> / <a href="/wiki/Dorothy_Round_Little" class="mw-redirect" title="Dorothy Round Little">Dorothy Round Little</a></li> 
                         <li>1935: <a href="/wiki/Fred_Perry" title="Fred Perry">Fred Perry</a> / <a href="/wiki/Dorothy_Round_Little" class="mw-redirect" title="Dorothy Round Little">Dorothy Round Little</a></li> 
                         <li>1936: <a href="/wiki/Fred_Perry" title="Fred Perry">Fred Perry</a> / <a href="/wiki/Dorothy_Round_Little" class="mw-redirect" title="Dorothy Round Little">Dorothy Round Little</a></li> 
                         <li>1937: <a href="/wiki/Don_Budge" title="Don Budge">Don Budge</a> / <a href="/wiki/Alice_Marble" title="Alice Marble">Alice Marble</a></li>

                         <li>1950: <a href="/wiki/Eric_Sturgess" title="Eric Sturgess">Eric Sturgess</a> / <a href="/wiki/Louise_Brough" title="Louise Brough">Louise Brough Clapp</a></li> 
                         <li>1951: <a href="/wiki/Frank_Sedgman" title="Frank Sedgman">Frank Sedgman</a> / <a href="/wiki/Doris_Hart" title="Doris Hart">Doris Hart</a></li>

                         <li>1961: <a href="/wiki/Fred_Stolle" title="Fred Stolle">Fred Stolle</a> / <a href="/wiki/Lesley_Turner_Bowrey" title="Lesley Turner Bowrey">Lesley Turner Bowrey</a></li> 
                         <li>1962: <a href="/wiki/Neale_Fraser" title="Neale Fraser">Neale Fraser</a> / <a href="/wiki/Margaret_Osborne_duPont" title="Margaret Osborne duPont">Margaret Osborne duPont</a></li>

                         <li>1964: <a href="/wiki/Fred_Stolle" title="Fred Stolle">Fred Stolle</a> / <a href="/wiki/Lesley_Turner_Bowrey" title="Lesley Turner Bowrey">Lesley Turner Bowrey</a></li> 
                         <li>1965: <a href="/wiki/Ken_Fletcher" title="Ken Fletcher">Ken Fletcher</a> / <a href="/wiki/Margaret_Court" title="Margaret Court">Margaret Smith</a></li>

                     <tr>
                      <th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: #c0d077;;width:1%"><a href="/wiki/History_of_tennis#Open_Era" title="History of tennis">Open Era</a></th>
                      <td class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px;background: #fcfdfd;">
                       <div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

                         <li>(1968) <a href="/wiki/Ken_Fletcher" title="Ken Fletcher">Ken Fletcher</a> / <a href="/wiki/Margaret_Court" title="Margaret Court">Margaret Court</a></li>
